about_the_game:
We all wondered what people are doing at those shipping companies, maybe we have dreamed of being a delivery man. We designed this game to understand and explain what it is like to look at life through the eyes of a cargo worker(owner or worker its up to you).
You can grapple with all sorts of ordeals on a deserted mountain road and make your bread with your sweat, or you can manage a shipping company in the city and swim in money in the monopoly you set up with your friends.
Logistics Simulator promises you good times to spend with your friends. When you buy this game, you buy not a game but a fun time to spend with your friends. Is it the sense of accomplishment of working together? Or is it the pleasure of taking a job behind your friends and pocketing the extra money? If you want to experience both, Logistics Simulator is for you.
Logistics Simulator is being prepared by a young developer. The problems will be resolved as soon as possible. As the game generates revenue, more content will be added and optimized for the best gaming experience for you.


  • Create and manage your own shipping company.
  • Get employees and assign tasks to staff
  • Deliver the cargo to your customers using various vehicles
  • Play with your friends
  • Design your warehouse
  • Explore
  • Customize your character

We all wondered what people are doing at those shipping companies, maybe we have dreamed of being a delivery man. We designed this game to understand and explain what it is like to look at life through the eyes of a cargo worker(owner or worker its up to you).

Is it the sense of accomplishment of working together? Or is it the pleasure of taking a job behind your friends and pocketing the extra money? name: Logistics Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Double Core 2 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520, Nvidia GT 730, AMD R7 240 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: I5-8400 // AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 // RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Logistics Simulator As an active member of a shipping company in a major city around the world, you can play with up to 10 friends in a multiplayer co-op mode or single player mode to help you understand what the cargo workers are going through, and maybe will make you rich.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Turkish, French, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Greek
*languages with full audio support
